name: Linker (FatHayBale)
description:
Linker is puzzle game there you are trapped in a dungeon and your only goal is to exit the facility by putting back your brain together or in other words linking it all back together. we wanted to call it cyber knight, but that name were taken so the game makes less sence

Game made by FatHayBale and Daxy215

FatHayBale - YouTube

Daxy215 - itch.io

Hope you enjoy

Controls:

A/D - move ; Space - jump; I - inventory;  S - crouch ; C - Lay down; H - Fly; Z- slow down time

Note- This game is hard and you might not understand it because of voice acting files were corrupted. :( we tried our best we are so sorry because of that
